short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kill the noise. Read in peace.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Klim Reader lets you read in peace by stripping the junk from the page. You can choose Klim fonts, change the background and set the font size as you wish. This is reading as it should be.
